name: MrsShark
0:
”Alexa, ask Mrs Shark to scold Baxter”
”chide Quintus”
”Alexa, ask Mrs Shark to ask Rudolph what time it is”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mrs shark
des: Is it evil time? Just ask Mrs. Shark! You can be sure that wherever conduct is amiss, a witty correction will soon be heard snapping the air.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
